title: Fragments, "Royal mantle", ca. 1785
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
dimensions: A. Warp: 101.5 cm (40 in.). Weft: 97 cm (38 1/4 in.). Left selvedge present. B. Warp: 24.5 cm (9 3/4 in.). Weft: 90.5 cm (35 1/2 in.). Left selvedge present. C. Warp: 32 cm (12 1/2 in.). Weft: 52 cm (20 1/2 in.) All edges cut. D. Warp: 38 cm (15 in.). Weft: 90.5 cm (35 3/4 in.) All edges cut. E. Warp: 24 cm (9 1/2 in.). Weft: 93 cm (36 1/2in.) Right selvedge present. F. Warp: 32 cm (12 1/2 in.). Weft: 51.5 cm (20 1/4 in.) Right selvedge present. G. Warp: 34 cm (13 1/2 in.). Weft: 53 cm (20 3/4 in). Pattern: height of repeat: 97.5 cm (38 1/4 in.). Fabric designed so that when lengths are sewn together they form straight repeats.
description: Large twisting tree and elaborate arrangement of oriental poppy-like blooms with scarf and mantle filled with fleur-de-lys and elaborate trophies with tassels and music books. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, "Royal mantle", ca. 1785.
ca. 1785. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-67-a/g.
